languages.text: "Да, я вижу. Где была круговерть цветов, теперь единство. Но разве тебя это не пугает? Ты как будто уже не картина, а просто... росчерк кисти".
"Yes, I see. Where there was a maelstrom of colours, now there is unity. But doesn't that scare you? It is as if you were no longer a painting, but a single brushstroke."
languages.original_text: "Да, я вижу. Где была круговерть цветов, теперь единство. Но разве тебя это не пугает? Ты как будто уже не картина, а просто... росчерк кисти".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, I see. Where there was a maelstrom of colours, now there is unity. But doesn't that scare you? It is as if you were no longer a painting, but a single brushstroke."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes, I see. Where there was a maelstrom of colours, now there is unity. But doesn't that scare you? It is as if you were no longer a painting, but a single brushstroke."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes, I see. Where there was a maelstrom of colours, now there is unity. But doesn't that scare you? It is as if you were no longer a painting, but a single brushstroke."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes, I see. Where there was a maelstrom of colours, now there is unity. But doesn't that scare you? It is as if you were no longer a painting, but a single brushstroke."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “是啊，我看到了。那些原本的色彩漩涡，如今已经成为了整体。不过，你不会为此感到恐惧吗？就好像你不再是一幅画，而变成了一抹单调的涂鸦。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, I see. Where there was a maelstrom of colours, now there is unity. But doesn't that scare you? It is as if you were no longer a painting, but a single brushstroke."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，我看到了。那些原本的色彩漩涡，如今已经成为了整体。不过，你不会为此感到恐惧吗？就好像你不再是一幅画，而变成了一抹单调的涂鸦。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Oui, je vois. Là où une tempête de couleurs faisait rage ne reste plus que l'unité. Comme si vous n'étiez plus qu'un simple coup de pinceau au lieu d'un tableau foisonnant de nuances. Cela ne vous fait pas peur ? »
languages.original_text: "Yes, I see. Where there was a maelstrom of colours, now there is unity. But doesn't that scare you? It is as if you were no longer a painting, but a single brushstroke."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, je vois. Là où une tempête de couleurs faisait rage ne reste plus que l'unité. Comme si vous n'étiez plus qu'un simple coup de pinceau au lieu d'un tableau foisonnant de nuances. Cela ne vous fait pas peur ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Sí, lo veo. Donde antes había un remolino de colores, ahora hay unidad. Pero ¿no le da miedo? Es como si en vez de ser un cuadro, fuera una sola pincelada».
languages.original_text: "Yes, I see. Where there was a maelstrom of colours, now there is unity. But doesn't that scare you? It is as if you were no longer a painting, but a single brushstroke."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, lo veo. Donde antes había un remolino de colores, ahora hay unidad. Pero ¿no le da miedo? Es como si en vez de ser un cuadro, fuera una sola pincelada».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ええ、わかります。色の〈渦〉があった場所が、今では調和しています。ですが、恐ろしくないのですか？一枚の絵ではなく、一筆しか描かれていないようなものですよ」
languages.original_text: "Yes, I see. Where there was a maelstrom of colours, now there is unity. But doesn't that scare you? It is as if you were no longer a painting, but a single brushstroke."

traits.locale_text: 「ええ、わかります。色の〈渦〉があった場所が、今では調和しています。ですが、恐ろしくないのですか？一枚の絵ではなく、一筆しか描かれていないようなものですよ」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ja, ich verstehe. Wo einst ein Mahlstrom an Farben war, herrscht nun Einheit. Aber macht Euch das keine Angst? Es ist, als wäret Ihr kein Gemälde mehr, sondern nur noch ein einzelner Pinselstrich."
languages.original_text: "Yes, I see. Where there was a maelstrom of colours, now there is unity. But doesn't that scare you? It is as if you were no longer a painting, but a single brushstroke."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, ich verstehe. Wo einst ein Mahlstrom an Farben war, herrscht nun Einheit. Aber macht Euch das keine Angst? Es ist, als wäret Ihr kein Gemälde mehr, sondern nur noch ein einzelner Pinselstrich."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Yes, I see. Where there was a maelstrom of colours, now there is unity. But doesn't that scare you? It is as if you were no longer a painting, but a single brushstroke."

languages.text: "Görüyorum. Bir zamanlar renk cümbüşlerinden geçilmeyen sende şimdilerde uyum var. Bu seni korkutmuyor mu? Artık bir resim değil, tek bir fırça darbesiymişsin gibi..."
languages.original_text: "Yes, I see. Where there was a maelstrom of colours, now there is unity. But doesn't that scare you? It is as if you were no longer a painting, but a single brushstroke."

traits.locale_text: "Tamam, anlıyorum. Bir zamanlar renk cümbüşlerine ev sahipliği yapan bu yerde şimdi bir uyum var. Bu, seni korkutmuyor mu? Artık bir resim değil, tek bir fırça darbesiymişsin gibi."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
